item.title: henrygd/beszel
item.description: Lightweight server monitoring hub with historical data, docker stats, and alerts.

item.description: Your favorite self-hostable alternative to Google Timeline (Google Location History)

item.title: glanceapp/glance
item.description: A self-hosted dashboard that puts all your feeds in one place

item.title: fccview/jotty
item.description: Lightweight but powerful alternative for managing your personal, file based, notes and checklists.

item.title: EgalitarianMonkey/hometube
item.description: HomeTube is a friendly video downloader managing single video URL into organized content structure for automatic home media server experience.

item.title: Tanq16/backhub
item.description: Backhub helps maintain backups of multiple GitHub repos as full local mirrors.

item.title: neonwatty/meme-search
item.description: The open source Meme Search Engine and Finder. Free and built to self-host locally with Python, Ruby, and Docker.
